content.content: Also just saw this video

First i will solve 2 aoc problems cause gotta catch up after that will do some research on nn algos for market prediction, i do have a few repos that i will see to see whats up one of them is [https://github.com/Sudhanshu-S3/Live-Strategy-Backtester-II](https://github.com/Sudhanshu-S3/Live-Strategy-Backtester-II)  from this i wanna see how to interface with teh market to get data and will take a look at the design of ts project.
And then need to study some for my finals :(  anyways for my decisions to make sense imma have to overwork everyone else lessgetoit :D
There should be ts innate sense of that im getting better yk i need to move fast real fast
Oh btw update: i did 3 aoc and yes did study the repo too more on this later
Also i might go on a lil hiatus due to finals but yeah will try to keep updating
One thing i wanna do in my life is iceskating i have a feeling once i get the hang of it ill be really good at it :D
I need to do more
anyways what imma do now today is study algos and implement them this is the winter imma consume more info than anyone ever and imma absorb it also :D
so yeah first thing i was thinking is can we train neural nets to predict markets? idk will have to find out :D
chasing an aesthetic that is particularly mine ;D
rejected a semidecent intern offer cause i didnt feel like doing it i could tell that this was not my path :D
toh i was thinking what should the current aesthetic i should be chasing be

currently i saw this reel about training a neural network to predict markets and my next arc is going deep in algos and modelling(as well as visualisation) so codeforces and ml sounds but in a more aristocratic way there isnt an end goal its just to train my mind and gain more knowledge and pure learning :D
i wanna make ervrtything
training arc i wanna train my body to move like achilles and i want to be more chill and want things in control, its time again to see that outer things dont really matter its the inside things
the greatest thing you ever worked on should still be yourself i think i should move in a way that the byproduct of that existence are peak things
